name: sge-eth-one-swoop
description: SGE Energy - Ethereum mainnet gasless minting and claim system

scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,APP -c cyan,green "npm run dev -w @sge/api" "npm run dev -w @sge/app"
scripts.dev:real: concurrently -n API,WORKERS,APP -c cyan,magenta,green "npm run dev -w @sge/api" "npm run worker:dev -w @sge/api" "npm run dev -w @sge/app"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @sge/shared && npm run build -w @sge/contracts && npm run build -w @sge/api && npm run build -w @sge/app
scripts.test:ci: npm test -w @sge/contracts && npm test -w @sge/api && npm test -w @sge/app
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:shared && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.setup:real: npm install && npm run db:up && sleep 5 && npm run prisma:push && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build:shared
